text: The Populist Party can refer to: * The People's Party (United States), a left- wing agrarian party that existed from 1891 to 1908. It was usually called the Populist Party. * The People's Party (United States, 1971), a party that was influenced by the previous People's Party. It existed from 1971 to 1976. Also sometimes called the Populist Party.
title: Populist Party
